name: Trans American Rally
storyline: This racing simulation came out only in Europe, and plays only on the G7400. An impressive, Rad Racer-esque title that sets players on a cross-country, multi-city tour of the United States.
summary: Trans American Rally is a racing game released in 1983. It is avaliable only for the Odyssey Videopac +.
